item.description:
SO? who will be the TURKEY this week????

Come on down and gobble your way to winning :)

We have fun, play a great game of cribbage and just enjoy the evening..

George and Alain, I truly hope you both will return - after all, I let you skunk me :) :) :)

Still miss you lots Gerrie and hope all is well with you.

Trina missed you and hope you got my hearts cards, etc....

Karen, Teresa, Bette, Laura and who can forget SUE (and brother Tom) so great to be able to play cribbage with y'all....
item.how_to_find_us: We wil be in the back room with our Cribbage Boards out on the TABLE!!!
item.name: Waltham Cribbage MeetUP
